defi_sdk_py.core package

Module contents

class defi_sdk_py.core.Core[source]

Bases: object

Core class provides the functionality to interact with the core of FWX-Protocol smart contracts.

adjust_collateral(nft_id: int, loan_id: int, collateral_adjust_amount: int, is_add: bool, is_estimate=False, gas: int = 0, gas_price: int = 0, nonce: int = 0) → TransactionReceipt | int[source]

Adjusts the collateral for a loan.

Parameters:

  • nft_id – The NFT ID associated with the loan

  • loan_id – The loan ID

  • collateral_adjust_amount – The amount by which to adjust the collateral

  • is_add – True to add collateral, False to remove

  • is_estimate – If True, returns the estimated gas for the transaction

  • gas – The gas limit for the transaction

  • gas_price – The gas price for the transaction

  • nonce – The nonce for the transaction

Returns:

The transaction receipt if not estimating gas, otherwise the estimated gas

adjust_collateral_event_block(from_block: int = 0, to_block: int = 0) → List[AdjustCollateralEvent][source]

Retrieves a list of AdjustCollateralEvent within a block range.

Parameters:

  • from_block – The starting block number

  • to_block – The ending block number

Returns:

A list of AdjustCollateralEvent instances

Retrieves the AdjustCollateralEvent by transaction hash.

Parameters:

tx_hash – The hash of the transaction to query

Returns:

An instance of AdjustCollateralEvent

check_staking_amount_sufficient(nft_id: int, new_amount: int, token: IERC20Metadata) → int[source]

Checks if the staking amount is sufficient for a given NFT ID and new amount.

Parameters:

  • nft_id – The NFT ID to check

  • new_amount – The new amount to check sufficiency against

  • token – The token for which to check the staking amount

Returns:

The result of the sufficiency check

close_position(nft_id: int, pos_id: int, closing_size: int, is_estimate=False, gas: int = 0, gas_price: int = 0, nonce: int = 0) → TransactionReceipt | int[source]

Closes an open trading position.

Parameters:

  • nft_id – The NFT ID associated with the position

  • pos_id – The position ID

  • closing_size – The size of the position to close

  • is_estimate – If True, returns the estimated gas for the transaction

  • gas – The gas limit for the transaction

  • gas_price – The gas price for the transaction

  • nonce – The nonce for the transaction

Returns:

The transaction receipt if not estimating gas, otherwise the estimated gas

deposit_collateral(nft_id: int, collateral_token_address: IERC20Metadata, underlying_token_address: IERC20Metadata, amount: int, is_estimate=False, gas: int = 0, gas_price: int = 0, nonce: int = 0) → TransactionReceipt | int[source]

Deposits collateral into a position.

Parameters:

  • nft_id – The NFT ID associated with the position

  • collateral_token_address – The address of the collateral token

  • underlying_token_address – The address of the underlying token

  • amount – The amount of collateral to deposit

  • is_estimate – If True, returns the estimated gas for the transaction

  • gas – The gas limit for the transaction

  • gas_price – The gas price for the transaction

  • nonce – The nonce for the transaction

Returns:

The transaction receipt if not estimating gas, otherwise the estimated gas

liquidate(nft_id: int, loan_id: int, is_estimate=False, gas: int = 0, gas_price: int = 0, nonce: int = 0) → TransactionReceipt | int[source]

Liquidates a loan that is undercollateralized or in default.

  • loan_id – The loan ID

  • is_estimate – If True, returns the estimated gas for the transaction

  • gas – The gas limit for the transaction

  • gas_price – The gas price for the transaction

  • nonce – The nonce for the transaction

Returns:

The transaction receipt if not estimating gas, otherwise the estimated gas

liquidate_position(nft_id: int, pair_byte: str, is_estimate=False, gas: int = 0, gas_price: int = 0, nonce: int = 0) → TransactionReceipt | int[source]

Liquidates an open trading position that is undercollateralized or in default.

Parameters:

  • nft_id – The NFT ID associated with the position

  • pair_byte – The byte representation of the pair associated with the position

  • is_estimate – If True, returns the estimated gas for the transaction

  • gas – The gas limit for the transaction

  • gas_price – The gas price for the transaction

  • nonce – The nonce for the transaction

Returns:

The transaction receipt if not estimating gas, otherwise the estimated gas

pairs(collateral_token: IERC20Metadata, underlying_token: IERC20Metadata) → Pair[source]

Retrieves the pair information for given collateral and underlying tokens. (ChainClient built-in TOKEN.<TOKEN_SYMBOL>)

Parameters:

  • collateral_token – The collateral token’s metadata

  • underlying_token – The underlying token’s metadata

Returns:

The pair information as a Pair object

Parameters:

  • nft_id – The NFT ID associated with the position

  • pair_byte – The pair byte representing the token pair

Returns:

The position information as a Position object

  • pos_id – The position ID

Returns:

The state of the position as a PositionState object

repay(nft_id: int, loan_id: int, repay_amount: int, is_only_interest: bool, is_estimate=False, gas: int = 0, gas_price: int = 0, nonce: int = 0) → TransactionReceipt | int[source]

Repays a loan or its interest.

Parameters:

  • nft_id – The NFT ID associated with the loan

  • loan_id – The loan ID

  • repay_amount – The amount to repay

  • is_only_interest – True to repay only interest, False to repay principal and interest

  • is_estimate – If True, returns the estimated gas for the transaction

  • gas – The gas limit for the transaction

  • gas_price – The gas price for the transaction

  • nonce – The nonce for the transaction

Returns:

The transaction receipt if not estimating gas, otherwise the estimated gas

rollver(nft_id: int, loan_id: int, is_estimate=False, gas: int = 0, gas_price: int = 0, nonce: int = 0) → TransactionReceipt | int[source]

Rolls over a loan to a new period.

Parameters:

  • nft_id – The NFT ID associated with the loan

  • loan_id – The loan ID

  • is_estimate – If True, returns the estimated gas for the transaction

  • gas – The gas limit for the transaction

  • gas_price – The gas price for the transaction

  • nonce – The nonce for the transaction

Returns:

The transaction receipt if not estimating gas, otherwise the estimated gas

trading_collateral_whitelist(collateral_token_address: IERC20Metadata | str) → bool[source]

Checks if a collateral token address is whitelisted for trading.

Parameters:

collateral_token_address – The address of the collateral token to check

Returns:

True if the token is whitelisted, False otherwise

withdraw_collateral(nft_id: int, collateral_token_address: IERC20Metadata, underlying_token_address: IERC20Metadata, amount: int, is_estimate=False, gas: int = 0, gas_price: int = 0, nonce: int = 0) → TransactionReceipt | int[source]

Withdraws collateral from a position.

Parameters:

  • nft_id – The NFT ID associated with the position

  • collateral_token_address – The address of the collateral token

  • underlying_token_address – The address of the underlying token

  • amount – The amount of collateral to withdraw

  • is_estimate – If True, returns the estimated gas for the transaction

  • gas – The gas limit for the transaction

  • gas_price – The gas price for the transaction

  • nonce – The nonce for the transaction

Returns:

The transaction receipt if not estimating gas, otherwise the estimated gas
